This is a test blog post that demonstrates nested slot injection and complex template composition.

Testing Methodology

When testing static site generators, it's important to validate:

  • Template composition and inheritance
  • Slot injection and content targeting
  • Head element merging and deduplication
  • Asset tracking and copying

Best Practices

Follow these best practices for comprehensive testing:

  1. Test with realistic site structures
  2. Validate edge cases and error conditions
  3. Ensure cross-platform compatibility
  4. Measure performance with large datasets
